An off-duty cop shot a 14-year-old boy in the head in Metairie after a light on the boy's phone went off, officials say.

The officer said he mistook the light as a firing gun. The boy had been joyriding with friends when an alarm went off, officials say. https://t.co/IXpol4F6e3
